Title: Sinbad: Mahou no Lamp to Ugoku Shima
Description:
['Sinbad and his friends run afoul of a storm while riding on the ship Bahal. Ali sights an island, which the ship heads toward to make repairs. Sinbad and Sana board a dinghy and land on the island. Sana sees a vision of a magical lamp, and Sinbad and the others set out to find it.', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: ANN)']
Related: ['Prequel: Mobile Suit SD Gundam Mk I', 'Sequel: Mobile Suit SD Gundam Mk III']
Voices: ['Tanabe, Momoko', 'Muranaka, Tomo', 'Aoyama, Yutaka', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Miyazawa, Tadashi', 'Kaga, Takeshi', 'Nagasawa, Nao']
Staff: [['Miyashita, Shinpei', 'Director'], ['Hayafune, Kaeko', 'Script'], ['Satou, Yoshiharu', 'Character Design, Chief Animation Director'], ['Kawasaki, Hiroyuki', 'Series Composition']]
